Carnations.title: Carnations
Carnations.text: Carnations represent love, beauty, and distinction. It is a species of Dianthus which is native to a Mediterranean region. Pink carnations represent gratitude.

Peonies.title: Peonies
Peonies.text: Peonies represent prosperity, happiness, romance, and good fortune. It is the only genus in Paeoniaceae. Its native roots follow back to Asia, Europe, and Western North America.

Tulips.title: Tulips
Tulips.text: Tulips represent love and cheerful thoughts. They bloom in the spring season. Its tepals usually have different blotch colours internally. Tulips are usually large, and brightly colored.
